quotes.quote: There is noÂ substituteÂ for a clear vision and a decisive direction.

There is no intellectual or emotional substitute for the authentic, the original, the unique masterpiece.
There's noÂ substituteÂ for will. Sometimes you have to fake will when you don't feel it at all.
There's noÂ substituteÂ for hard work and effort beyond the call of duty. That is what strengthens the soul and ennobles one's character.
There is noÂ substituteÂ for work; what seems ease of performance comes from the greatest labor.
You can't substitute the act of making people laugh. It's definitely something that actors like to do.Â
There is noÂ substituteÂ for your impassioned prayers on behalf of your children
There is noÂ substituteÂ for character. You can buy brains but you cannot buy character.
There is no substitute for talent. Industry and all its virtues are of no avail.
There is noÂ substituteÂ for books in the life of a child.
TheÂ replacementÂ of negative thought with positive thought brings about a spiritual and physical change that can heal.
There can never be anyÂ substituteÂ for your own palate nor any better education than tasting the wine yourself.
Just as there is noÂ substituteÂ for original works of art, there is noÂ substituteÂ for the world of direct sensual experience.
There is noÂ substitutionÂ for hustle, and if you don't hustle there will beÂ substitution.
No one can be aÂ replacementÂ for another person. That is why, farewells are always difficult.
There's noÂ substituteÂ for a great love who says, 'No matter what's wrong with you, you're welcome at this table.'.
There is noÂ substituteÂ for the comfort supplied by the utterly taken-for-granted relationship.
There is noÂ substituteÂ for hard work. There is no such thing as overnight success or easy money.
We mustÂ substituteÂ courage for caution.
There is noÂ substituteÂ for work. Worthwhile results come from hard work and careful planning.

There is no substitute for accurate knowledge. Know yourself, know your business, know your men.

There is no substitute for excellence - not even success.

There's noÂ substituteÂ to being successful on an actual chart.
There is no substitute for hard work when it comes to achieving success.
